comment: If you want to get an A without learning anything, she is the one for you. You can miss every single class and still get a A+. There are only 5 tests that are all online. You can just google the answers. Easiest A ever.

Easiest professor I have had in my 3 years of being at KSU.  I didn't show up to any classes and still made high a's on every test.  She posts all the powerpoints on d2l and the tests are online.  You can google almost every single question on the tests.  I would definitely take this teacher again.

Easy A. Don't have to go to class, she cancels a lot as well. Really cool person if you actually go to class. Tests were all online, open everything. No homework. Only grades were the 4 tests. Required cumulative final. Gave 2 bonus quizzes for Extra Credit. If you want an A, take her.

I did not go to class but a few times this semester, because it was all online, but she basically reads straight off of the power points. For someone who has no interest in business law, this class is boring and pointless. But she isn't necessarily hard. Only a few tests online and HW very week which was online and you can "check your work".
test are online. only 2 test but weekly discussions and online homework. real easy a

Easiest class I have ever taken, did not learn 1 thing. Everything is online done by cengage dont but the text book you wont use it, if you want to learn something dont take this class, if you need an easy A then you are set.

Horrible. Did not learn a single thing. EVERYTHING is online, had 2 discussions all semester, she only held class 3 times. Quizzes, open book, unlimited attempts. Midterm/Final online, one attempt, literally drag and drop everything into google for an A. Not like I needed this class for my major or anything. /sarcasm.

very easy class, basically you do nothing besides online work and discussions once a week but we only had 2 all semester, test are online and very easy open everything. If you want to learn something do not take this class. If you want an easy A this is the class for you

Easy A, take her. Not a hybrid class but treated like one. Discussions online one day and class the other. Two test, both online and open everything. Weekly online multiple choice chapter question with the check answer option. 1000 pts total, 200 per test, 500 pts for chapter questions, 100 pts handbook assignment due at the end of the semester.

This professor was AWESOME! Everything was pretty much online. She only meets for class once a week and a discussion on the day that you don't meet. Homework quizzes are all online and you have unlimited times to take it, plus you can check your work before submitting it. Midterm and Final is Online

Very easy A. Online textbook is used for HW, midterm and final. Online case discussion every week. Deff a GPA boosting class especially since its a requirement for Business students. Only thing she does not respond to emails promptly. Midterm and Final are curved. Take Her!

Very easy class! Do need textbook because tests open note and need for reference. Tests basically word for word from book! She posts powerpoints. Her class consisted of weekly online discussion questions and homework, and one midterm and one final. That's it! Very little busy work. Can earn an easy A if show up n keep up with homework.
